contents.text: Welcome to Meltwater, your San Francisco-based partner in business analytics.
For information on our analytics solutions and products, press 1.
For sales and pricing inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I need a clear breakdown of your analytics solutions’ pricing.
Learn about veteran or nonprofit pricing options for a Meltwater analytics subscription
Get detailed pricing tiers and licensing options for Meltwater's real-time analytics API.
I'd like to get a price quote for your analytics service.
I’d like detailed pricing information for Meltwater’s analytics solutions to see if I can include it in my research budget.

contents.text: For product demonstrations and tours, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to schedule your demo.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a demo of your analytics platform.
Schedule a product demonstration to evaluate Meltwater analytics for my veteran-run small business
Schedule a live demo of Meltwater's data visualization dashboard features.
I want to schedule a demonstration of your analytics platform.
I want to schedule a live demonstration of your analytics platform to evaluate its capabilities for my data analysis project.

contents.text: For customer support and service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m encountering a technical issue and need troubleshooting assistance.
Troubleshoot an error when exporting analytics reports from my account
Troubleshoot the API integration error I'm seeing with Meltwater's analytics endpoint.
I’m having trouble with the dashboard and need technical support.
I need technical assistance troubleshooting why my Meltwater dashboard graphs aren’t loading correctly.

contents.text: For account management and billing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss a billing discrepancy and update my payment method.
Obtain a detailed invoice for my recent Meltwater subscription to submit for reimbursement
Update our corporate billing method and review the invoice breakdown for last quarter.
I need help understanding my invoice and billing options.
I have questions about my latest Meltwater invoice and need to update my billing information.
